type Cursor = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable

summary.span: 代表用于绘制鼠标指针的图像。

span.span: Represents the image used to paint the mouse pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 光标是一个小图片, 其在屏幕上的位置由指针设备 (如鼠标、笔或轨迹球) 控制。A cursor is a small picture whose location on the screen is controlled by a pointing device, such as a mouse, pen, or trackball. 当用户移动指针设备时, 操作系统会相应地移动光标。When the user moves the pointing device, the operating system moves the cursor accordingly. 不同的光标形状用于通知用户鼠标将具有的操作。Different cursor shapes are used to inform the user what operation the mouse will have. 例如, 编辑或选择文本时, 通常会显示一个游标。For example, when editing or selecting text, a cursor is typically displayed. 等待游标通常用于通知用户进程当前正在运行。A wait cursor is commonly used to inform the user that a process is currently running. 用户可能会等待的进程的示例是打开文件、保存文件或填充控件 ( 例如), 或者使用大量数据。Examples of processes you might have the user wait for are opening a file, saving a file, or filling a control such as a , or with a large amount of data. 派生自类的所有控件都有一个属性。All controls that derive from the class have a property. 若要更改鼠标指针在控件边界内时显示的光标, 请将指定 给控件的属性。To change the cursor displayed by the mouse pointer when it is within the bounds of the control, assign a to the property of the control. 或者, 可以通过将分配 给属性, 在应用程序级别显示光标。Alternatively, you can display cursors at the application level by assigning a to the property. 例如, 如果你的应用程序的目的是编辑文本文件, 则可以将属性设置为 , 以便在文件加载或保存时在应用程序上显示等待光标, 以防处理任何鼠标事件。For example, if the purpose of your application is to edit a text file, you might set the property to to display a wait cursor over the application while the file loads or saves to prevent any mouse events from being processed. 完成此过程后, 将属性设置为 , 以使应用程序在每个控件类型上显示相应的光标。When the process is complete, set the property to for the application to display the appropriate cursor over each control type. > [!NOTE] > 如果在将 属性重置回游标之前调用, 则应用程序将继续侦听鼠标事件, 并将继续显示应用程序中每个控件的相应。If you call before resetting the property back to the cursor, the application will resume listening for mouse events and will resume displaying the appropriate for each control in the application. 可以从多个源创建游标对象, 例如现有的句柄、标准文件、资源或数据流。Cursor objects can be created from several sources, such as the handle of an existing , a standard file, a resource, or a data stream. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持带有黑色和白色以外颜色的动画光标 (ani 文件) 或光标。The class does not support animated cursors (.ani files) or cursors with colors other than black and white. 如果用作游标的图像太小, 则可以使用方法强制该图像填充游标的边界。If the image you are using as a cursor is too small, you can use the method to force the image to fill the bounds of the cursor. 可以通过调用方法来暂时隐藏光标, 并通过调用方法来还原游标。You can temporarily hide the cursor by calling the method, and restore it by calling the method. 从 .NET Framework 4.5.2 开始, 当 app.config 文件包含以下项时, 将根据系统 DPI 设置调整大小:Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, the will be resized based on the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ```   ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了一个窗体, 该窗体演示如何使用自定义光标。The following code example displays a form that demonstrates using a custom cursor. 自定义嵌入在应用程序的资源文件中。The custom is embedded in the application's resource file. 该示例需要一个名为`MyCursor.cur`的游标文件中包含的游标。The example requires a cursor contained in a cursor file named `MyCursor.cur`. 若要使用命令行编译此示例, 请包括以下标志:`/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur`To compile this example using the command line, include the following flag: `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur` [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/CS/customcursor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/VB/customcursor.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例在控件中显示客户信息。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称, 子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中, 1000 客户显示每个订单15个订单。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 使用和方法可取消重画, 并在创建和绘制对象时显示等待。 The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求在应用程序目录中有一个`MyWait.cur`名为的光标文件。This example requires that you have a cursor file named `MyWait.cur` in the application directory. 它还需要一个`Customer`对象, 该对象可保存`Order`对象的集合, 并且已在上 创建了控件的一个实例。It also requires a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects, and that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成后, 必须释放游标句柄。You must free the cursor handle when you are done with it. 有关释放资源的详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about disposing of resources, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从光标的位置创建游标, 并更改其位置和剪辑矩形。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 结果是, 光标将从执行代码的位置向上移动到50像素左右。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外, 光标的剪辑矩形将更改为窗体的边界 (默认情况下, 它是用户的整个屏幕)。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此示例要求你具有 和, 以便在单击时调用此代码。This example requires that you have a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的`stream`数据流必须包含一个游标 (当前) 文件。The data stream specified by `stream` must contain a cursor (.cur) file. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持动画光标 (ani 文件)。Animated cursors (.ani files) are not supported by the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从的方法 所创建的中加载游标。The following code example loads a cursor from a created by the method of an . 调用方法时, 会向用户显示, 并在时显示。When the method is called, an is displayed to the user and when a. 选择 "当前文件" 并关闭对话框后, 将打开文件并使用返回的来创建。CUR file is selected and the dialog closed, the file is opened and the returned is used to create a . [!code-cpp[CursorFromResource#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CPP/mycursor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CursorFromResource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CS/mycursor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CursorFromResource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/VB/mycursor.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `fileName`参数必须引用标准游标 (当前) 文件。The `fileName` parameter must reference a standard cursor (.cur) file. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持动画光标 (ani 文件)。Animated cursors (.ani files) are not supported by the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在控件中显示客户信息。The following code example displays customer information in a control. 根树节点显示客户名称, 子树节点显示分配给每个客户的订单号。The root tree nodes display customer names, and the child tree nodes display the order numbers assigned to each customer. 在此示例中, 1000 客户显示每个订单15个订单。In this example, 1,000 customers are displayed with 15 orders each. 使用和方法可取消重画, 并在创建和绘制对象时显示等待。 The repainting of the is suppressed by using the and methods, and a wait is displayed while the creates and paints the objects. 此示例要求您有一个`Customer`可以保存`Order`对象集合的对象。This example requires that you have a `Customer` object that can hold a collection of `Order` objects. 它还要求您已 在上创建了控件的实例。It also requires that you have created an instance of a control on a . [!code-cpp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CPP/treeview.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/CS/treeview.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TreeView#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeView/VB/treeview.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的示例演示如何在应用程序中将游标嵌入到资源中。The following is an example of how to embed a cursor as a resource within your application. 若要嵌入资源, 请引用后跟逗号的资源名称, 然后引用其完整的程序集路径。To embed the resource, reference the resource name followed by a comma, then its full assembly path. 请参阅 "示例" 部分, 了解如何从嵌入的资源加载光标。See the Example section to learn how to load the cursor from the embedded resource. ``` Using the C# compiler: csc /resource:"MyWaitCursor.cur","MyCursors.MyWaitCursor.cur" MyCursor.cs Using the Visual Basic compiler: vbc /resource:"MyWaitCursor.cur","MyCursors.MyWaitCursor.cur" MyCursor.vb ``` > [!NOTE] > 在编译C#和在代码中引用资源时, 资源引用对于和 Visual Basic 编译器都是区分大小写的。The resource reference when compiling as well as when referencing it in code, is case sensitive for both the C# and Visual Basic compilers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体, 该窗体演示如何通过使用构造函数来使用自定义光标。The following code example displays a form that demonstrates using a custom cursor by using the constructor. 自定义嵌入在应用程序的资源文件中。The custom is embedded in the application's resource file. 该示例要求游标文件中包含一个名为`MyCursor.cur`的游标。The example requires that you have a cursor contained in a cursor file named `MyCursor.cur`. 若要使用命令行编译此示例, 请包括以下标志:`/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur`To compile this example using the command line, include the following flag: `/res:MyCursor.Cur, CustomCursor.MyCursor.Cur` [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/CS/customcursor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor/VB/customcursor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置表示光标的剪辑矩形的边界。

span.span: Gets or sets the bounds that represent the clipping rectangle for the cursor.

value.span: 代表 的剪辑矩形的 （采用屏幕坐标的形式）。

span.span: The that represents the clipping rectangle for the , in screen coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许剪辑的光标只能在其剪辑矩形内移动。A clipped cursor is allowed to move only within its clipping rectangle. 通常, 系统仅在当前捕获鼠标时才允许。Generally, the system allows this only if the mouse is currently captured. 如果当前未剪裁光标, 则生成的矩形将包含整个屏幕的尺寸。If the cursor is not currently clipped, the resulting rectangle contains the dimensions of the entire screen. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从光标的位置创建游标, 并更改其位置和剪辑矩形。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 结果是, 光标将从执行代码的位置向上移动到50像素左右。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外, 光标的剪辑矩形将更改为窗体的边界 (默认情况下, 它是用户的整个屏幕)。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此示例要求你具有 和, 以便在单击时调用此代码。This example requires that you have a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于调用此方法而创建的句柄在完成后必须释放, 因为它不会被垃圾回收器释放。The handle created as a result of calling this method must be disposed of when you are done with it because it will not be disposed of by the garbage collector.

summary.span: 获取或设置代表鼠标光标的光标对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a cursor object that represents the mouse cursor.
A that represents the mouse cursor.

value.span: 如果鼠标光标不可见，则默认为 。

span.span: The default is if the mouse cursor is not visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性将更改当前显示的光标。Setting the property changes the cursor currently displayed. 应用程序可能会也可能不会继续侦听鼠标事件。The application may or may not continue to listen for mouse events. 若要指示应用程序在长时间运行的操作期间不应响应鼠标事件, 请使用属性。To signal that the application should not respond to mouse events during a long-running operation, use the property. 但在大多数情况下, 最好使用后台线程来管理长时间运行的操作, 并使用户界面对用户可用。In most cases, however, it's better to use a background thread to manage a long-running operation, and leave your user interface accessible to the user. 有关轻松实现后台任务的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on easily implementing a background task, see .

permission.span: 用于安全子窗口以设置此属性。

span.span: for safe subwindows to set this property.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后, 必须释放对的所有引用, 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则, 在垃圾回收器释放资源之前, 将不会释放它所使用的资源。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector frees it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上以其正常大小绘制指定的光标, 在拉伸模式下绘制两倍于其大小。The following code example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此示例需要 和, 以便在调用方法时传入方法。This example requires a and a to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

param.name: g
param.span: 要在其上绘制 的 表面。

span.span: The surface on which to draw the .
The that represents the bounds of the .

summary.span: 在指定边界内、指定的表面上绘制光标。

span.span: Draws the cursor on the specified surface, within the specified bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘图命令是由`g`参数表示的图形表面生成的, 但是不包含有关如何呈现给定图像的信息, 因此它将对的调用传递给。The drawing command originates on the graphics surface represented by the `g` parameter, but a does not contain information about how to render a given image, so it passes the call to the . 方法将图像裁剪到给定的尺寸, 并允许您指定要在其中绘制的。 The method crops the image to the given dimensions and allows you to specify a within which to draw the . 如果要在图形表面上绘制光标, 通常使用此方法。This method is typically used if you want to draw the cursor on a Graphics surface. 例如, 您可能有一个对话框, 该对话框允许用户从控件或一组控件选择游标。For example, you might have a dialog that allows the user to select cursors from a control, or a group of controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上以其正常大小绘制指定的光标, 在拉伸模式下绘制两倍于其大小。The following code example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此示例要求在调用方法时有一个和一个要传递给方法的对象。This example requires that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

summary.span: 在指定边界内、指定的表面上以拉伸格式绘制光标。

span.span: Draws the cursor in a stretched format on the specified surface, within the specified bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘图命令是由`g`参数表示的图形表面生成的, 但对象不包含有关如何呈现给定图像的信息, 因此它将调用传递给对象。The drawing command originates on the graphics surface represented by the `g` parameter, but a object does not contain information about how to render a given image, so it passes the call to the object. 绘制游标时, 方法拉伸图像以填充指定的。The method stretches the image to fill the specified when the cursor is drawn. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在窗体上以其正常大小绘制指定的光标, 在拉伸模式下绘制两倍于其大小。The following code example draws the specified cursor on the form in its normal size, and in stretched mode, twice its size. 此示例要求在调用方法时有一个和一个要传递给方法的对象。This example requires that you have a and a object to pass into the method when it is called. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#2)]

span.span: if this cursor is equal to the specified ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例从光标的位置创建游标, 并更改其位置和剪辑矩形。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 结果是, 光标将从执行代码的位置向上移动到50像素左右。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外, 光标的剪辑矩形将更改为窗体的边界 (默认情况下, 它是用户的整个屏幕)。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此示例需要 和, 以便在单击时调用此代码。This example requires a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取光标句柄。

span.span: Gets the handle of the cursor.
An that represents the cursor's handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这不是句柄的副本;不要释放它。This is not a copy of the handle; do not dispose of it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从光标的位置创建游标, 并更改其位置和剪辑矩形。The following code example creates a cursor from the cursor's , changes its position and clipping rectangle. 结果是, 光标将从执行代码的位置向上移动到50像素左右。The result is the cursor will move up and to the left 50 pixels from where it is when the code is executed. 此外, 光标的剪辑矩形将更改为窗体的边界 (默认情况下, 它是用户的整个屏幕)。Additionally, the cursor's clipping rectangle is changed to the bounds of the form (by default it is the user's whole screen). 此示例需要 和, 以便在单击时调用此代码。This example requires a and a to call this code when it is clicked. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CPP/cursorstuff.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/CS/cursorstuff.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Cursor Members/VB/cursorstuff.vb#1)]

summary.span: 隐藏光标。

span.span: Hides the cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法调用必须平衡。The and method calls must be balanced. 对于每次调用方法, 都必须具有对方法的相应调用。For every call to the method there must be a corresponding call to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在鼠标指针进入按钮的工作区时隐藏光标。The following code example hides the cursor when the mouse pointer enters the button's client area. 同样, 当鼠标指针离开按钮的工作区时, 将再次显示光标。Likewise, when the mouse pointer leaves the button's client area, the cursor is shown again. 此示例需要一个 具有名为`myButton`的。This example requires a with a named `myButton`. [!code-cpp[CursorFromResource#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CPP/mycursor.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CursorFromResource#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/CS/mycursor.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CursorFromResource#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CursorFromResource/VB/mycursor.vb#3)]
